data: SIDCO⁢(d,h,t)subscriptSIDCO𝑑ℎ𝑡\text{SIDC}_{\text{O}}(d,h,t)SIDC start_POSTSUBSCRIPT O end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_d , italic_h , italic_t )
All periods when the cross-border order book is open.
The first wave of cross-border order book coupling at 18:00 on d−1𝑑1d-1italic_d - 1.
The second wave of cross-border order book coupling at 22:00 on d−1𝑑1d-1italic_d - 1.
